scripts.build: next build && echo Build completed successfully
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); console.log('Checking for out directory...'); console.log('Current working directory:', process.cwd()); console.log('Directory listing:', fs.readdirSync('.').join(', ')); if (!fs.existsSync('out')) { console.error('ERROR: out directory not found after build'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('âœ“ out directory created successfully'); console.log('out directory contents:', fs.readdirSync('out').slice(0, 10).join(', ')); }"
